Main Services

Web Development

Web Development

I program websites using HTML, Sass, JavaScript, and GitHub for version control. Every detail is checked and tested to ensure consistent functionality. If there's a specific feature you have in mind, let's talk about how to bring it to life!

Web Design

Web Design

I am experienced with Figma, CSS, Sass, and responsive web design. Need some custom content? I create graphics, SVGs, custom animations, and more. Finding the aesthetics that will emulate your brand's goals and style is a priority to me.

UI/UX

UI/UX

User experience matters. By understanding the goals you have for your site, I strategically create great user experiences with intuitive interfaces that will grab attention and keep visitors on your site to see more.

SEO

SEO

Knowing what search engines look for in websites is important to get more visitors to the site. I always keep SEO in mind while creating a site, and do a full optimization review before it gets launched.

Brand Strategy

Brand Strategy

Creating a digital strategy to grab the interest and keep the attention of your users is a must. During our meetings I can offer advice and ideas on how to best execute smart layouts, branding, and an effective call-to-action.

Hosting Set-Up

Hosting Set-Up

I will set up your website for you through shared hosting servers which offer reliability, affordable prices, and great performance. You will have full control of the site post-launch, though I will be available if you need help with updates or maintenance in the future!
